entry.title: Flatten Nested JSON with Pandas
entry.content: I believe the pandas library takes the expression "batteries included" to a whole new level (in a good way). Recent evidence: the pandas.io.json.json_normalize function. It turns an array of nested JSON objects into a flat DataFrame with dotted-namespace column names. It may not seem like much, but I've found it invaluable when working with responses from RESTful APIs.

entry.title: Control Read/Write Access to Your Private Docker Registry
entry.summary: Control Read/Write Access to Your Private Docker Registry
entry.content: Last year, I wrote a post on how to run a private Docker registry backed by SoftLayer Object Storage. Soon after, my team and I started using such a registry at work behind an nginx proxy requiring basic authentication. This setup, documented in numerous places on the web, sufficed for the last six months: it let our team to push and pull images while denying anonymous access.
